successStories.description: Hear from our partners about their experience working with Global Sinergi Kapital.

story1.quote: Global Sinergi Kapital's expertise was instrumental in our IPO success. Their team guided us through every step with professionalism and dedication.
story1.author: Budi Santoso
story1.achievement: Successfully raised Rp 500 billion in IPO

story2.quote: Our strategic partnership with GSK has elevated our capital markets operations. Their insights and network are invaluable.

story3.quote: Working with GSK transformed our approach to capital markets. Their innovative solutions and dedicated support exceeded our expectations.
story3.author: Ahmad Wijaya

step2.title: Partnership Agreement
step2.description: Formalize our collaboration with clear terms, mutual benefits, and aligned objectives.

step3.title: Strategic Planning
step3.description: Develop a comprehensive roadmap together, leveraging our combined strengths and resources.

step4.title: Implementation & Growth
step4.description: Execute our strategy with ongoing support, regular reviews, and continuous optimization.

faq.title: Partnership Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about partnering with Global Sinergi Kapital.

item1.question: What types of partnerships does GSK offer?
item1.answer: We offer various partnership models including strategic alliances, referral partnerships, joint ventures, and service partnerships. Each model is tailored to meet specific business objectives and mutual benefits.

item2.question: What are the requirements to become a partner?
item2.answer: Partners should share our commitment to excellence, have a strong reputation in their field, and demonstrate alignment with our values. Specific requirements vary based on partnership type, and we evaluate each opportunity individually.

item3.question: How does GSK support its partners?
item3.answer: We provide comprehensive support including dedicated relationship managers, regular training and updates, marketing support, technical resources, and access to our extensive network and expertise.

item4.question: What is the typical duration of partnerships?
item4.answer: Partnership duration varies based on the nature of collaboration. While some project-based partnerships may last 6-12 months, strategic partnerships are typically long-term relationships that evolve and grow over years.

item5.question: How are partnership revenues shared?
item5.answer: Revenue sharing models are structured based on partnership type and value contribution from each party. We ensure fair and transparent arrangements that incentivize growth and success for all partners.

item6.question: Can international companies partner with GSK?
item6.answer: Yes, we welcome international partnerships. Our global network includes partners from various countries, and we have experience facilitating cross-border collaborations in capital markets.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Our partnership team is ready to help you understand how we can work together.
